rows.label: tlk45100141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I dunno who invented those
artificial Blades, but I
feel sorry for them.

rows.label: tlk45100141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Having their creation stolen by Iira
and used as a terrible weapon...

rows.label: tlk45100141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Inventors always have a hard time
of it. My dad, the guy who invented
artificial Blades - all of them!

rows.label: tlk45100141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
It makes me sad that great skills
bring trouble instead of respect.
Sometimes the world just isn't fair.
